data.name: Global Azure Atlanta 2020
data.description: The annual Global Azure (formerly Global Azure Bootcamp) event will return to the greater metro-Atlanta area for the 6th year! The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthus…
